title: Corporate Attack on Democracy, Noam Chomsky
description: Noam Chomsky discusses the longstanding hostility of the rich to public awareness and understanding so they don't realize they are victims of an economic and political system they need to replace with one that truly serves the public. March 16, 2012 Special thanks to Rev. Rhonda Rubinson of St. Philip's Church of Harlem for facilitating this production. Camera, Joe Friendly.
